snippet.title: One dead after Reservoir collision
snippet.content: A PERSON has died and a man taken to hospital after a head-on collision between a car and ute in Melbourne's north. Police believe the car and ute collided on Plenty Rd near Chaleyer St, Reservoir about 6.30pm on Friday. A passenger in the car died at the scene, Victoria Police spokeswoman Belinda Batty said. She said the male driver of the ute was taken to hospital with minor injuries. The person who died is yet to be identified. Police are investigating the incident and have asked witnesses or anyone with dashcam footage from the area to contact Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000 or submit a confidential crime report at
